item.title: Updated: Comments on OSS/FS Software Configuration Management (SCM) Systems
item.description: I’ve updated my paper Comments on Open Source Software / Free Software (OSS/FS) Software Configuration Management (SCM) Systems. This is basically a review of several of these systems. I can’t possibly look at them all, but I intend for it to be a useful place to start. Given the recent issues with BitMover (maker of BitKeeper), causing Linus Torvalds to look at other SCM tools to manage Linux kernel development, this seems pretty timely.
